title: reflect: Value's == behavior changed between 1.3 and 1.4
body:
the following code snippet has different behavior when I run it on 1.3 and 1.4 respectively.
code are in https://play.golang.org/p/yfy7ZKqU1Y

when I run on 1.3, we have the following response:
```
false
0
0x0
true
```

while, It report false in the last println in golang 1.4
```
false
0
0x0
false
```

not sure whether it is a bug or something
